verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> against you, <S%H1121><s%> children of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> against the whole family <S%H4940><s%> which I brought up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying: <S%H559><s%>
"You only have I chosen <S%H3045><s%> of all the families <S%H4940><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%> Therefore I will punish <S%H6485><s%> you for all of your sins. <S%H5771><s%>"
Do two <S%H8147><s%> walk <S%H3212><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> unless <S%H1115><s%> they have agreed? <S%H3259><s%>

Will a lion <S%H738><s%> roar <S%H7580><s%> in the thicket, <S%H3293><s%> when he has no prey? <S%H2964><s%> Does a young lion <S%H3715><s%> cry out <S%H5414><s%> of his den, <S%H4585><s%> if he has caught <S%H3920><s%> nothing? <S%H1115><s%>

Can a bird <S%H6833><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> in a trap <S%H4170><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> where no snare <S%H6341><s%> is set for him? <S%H6341><s%> Does a snare spring up <S%H5927><s%> from the ground, <S%H127><s%> when there <S%H3920><s%> is nothing to catch? <S%H3920><s%>

Does the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> alarm sound in a city, <S%H5892><s%> without the people <S%H5971><s%> being afraid? <S%H2729><s%> Does evil <S%H7451><s%> happen to a city, <S%H5892><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hasn't <S%H6213><s%> done it?

Surely the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> nothing, <S%H1697><s%> unless he reveals <S%H1540><s%> his secret <S%H5475><s%> to his servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets. <S%H5030><s%>
The lion <S%H738><s%> has roared. <S%H7580><s%> Who will not <S%H3808><s%> fear? <S%H3372><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> has spoken. <S%H1696><s%> Who can but prophesy? <S%H5012><s%>

Proclaim <S%H8085><s%> in the palaces <S%H759><s%> at Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> and in the palaces <S%H759><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> "Assemble <S%H622><s%> yourselves on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H7227><s%> unrest <S%H4103><s%> is in <S%H7130><s%> her, <S%H6217><s%> and what oppression is among them. <S%H8432><s%>"

"Indeed they don't <S%H3045><s%> know to do <S%H6213><s%> right, <S%H5229><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Who hoard <S%H686><s%> plunder <S%H2555><s%> and loot <S%H7701><s%> in their palaces. <S%H759><s%>"

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> "An adversary <S%H6862><s%> will overrun <S%H5439><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> and he will pull down <S%H3381><s%> your strongholds, <S%H5797><s%> and your fortresses <S%H759><s%> will be plundered. <S%H962><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "As the shepherd <S%H7462><s%> rescues out <S%H5337><s%> of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the lion <S%H738><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> legs, <S%H3767><s%> or a piece <S%H915><s%> of an ear, <S%H241><s%> so shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be rescued <S%H5337><s%> who sit <S%H3427><s%> in Samaria <S%H8111><s%> on the corner <S%H6285><s%> of a couch, <S%H4296><s%> and on the silken cushions <S%H1833><s%> of a bed. <S%H4296><s%>"

"Listen, <S%H8085><s%> and testify <S%H5749><s%> against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> the God <S%H3069><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

"For in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I visit <S%H6485><s%> the transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> on him, <S%H6485><s%> I will also visit the altars <S%H4196><s%> of Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> and the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> will be cut off, <S%H1438><s%> and fall <S%H5307><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

I will strike <S%H5221><s%> the winter <S%H2779><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> with the summer <S%H7019><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of ivory <S%H8127><s%> will perish, <S%H6><s%> and the great <S%H7227><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> will have an end, <S%H5486><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
